FlavorTextOption.Text: It seems some independent researchers have made a breakthrough and discovered the {TECHNAME:2} Technology all on their own. Unfortunately, they also seem to be sharing it with the rest of the galaxy as well as us.
It was noble of them to be so generous. We must use this breakthrough to make the galaxy a better place. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +15)[/COLOR]
Let us see if we can make use of this windfall as quickly as possible. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +15)[/COLOR]
If they are foolish enough to give away technology, we will make use of it. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +15)[/COLOR]
